snippet: Federal authorities said Christopher Lee Cornell was charged in connection with planning the attack and had hoped to ally himself with the Islamic State.
abstract: Federal authorities report arrest of Christopher Lee Cornell of Ohio in plot to attack United States Capitol using pipe bombs; charges against Cornell, who had discussed allying himself with Islamic State, include trying to kill federal officer and possession of firearm with intent to commit violence.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities said Christopher Lee Cornell was charged in connection with planning the attack and had hoped to ally himself with the Islamic State.

headline.main: Man Is Held in Inquiry on Capitol Attack Plot
headline.print_headline: Man Is Held in Inquiry on Capitol Attack Plot

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
